MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH16 area of Edinburgh, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:08am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the local substation. And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:15am. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:15AM on Monday, 08 March 2021.
